item.title: REDtalks.live #036 - Christian Weber from GitHub on Infrastructure as Code
item.description: Delighted to have GitHub’s Christian Weber on the show this week to share his experiences with Infrastructure as Code. Watch this episode to hear Christian explain some personal experiences, from his days before he worked at GitHub, where Infrastructure/Configuration as Code would have made a big difference.
